title: The Wiggles movie [DVD]
other_title: Wiggles magical adventure: a Wiggly movie
creator_contributor_role: Twentieth Century-Fox Film Corporation, production company
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Parties
description: The Wiggles - Murray, Jeff, Anthony and Greg are planning a surprise birthday party for their friend Dorothy the Dinosaur. There is a big problem however, their guest of honor has gone missing, she's in pursuit of a magician who has stolen Greg's wand, and is upset to think her friends have forgotten her birthday. The Wiggles begin a pursuit of their own when they try to locate Dorothy in time for her party, having a wiggling good time along the way. This is The Wiggles first feature length film and includes seven new songs. Cast also includes Tony Harvey, Leeanne Ashley, Carolyn Ferrie, Paul Paddick, John Field and Joanne Samuel. Also available on VHS [310707]
